inclusion.criterion: elective patients to coronary artery bypass graft surgery
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: left ventricle ejection fraction higher than 40%
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: ejection fraction lower than 39% and abnormal renal function (serum creatinine > 2.0 mg/dl)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: clearance lower than 45 mL/m in males or lower than 40 mL/m in females
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has normal renal function and ejection fraction higher than 39%, making them eligible for the trial.
